name: The Alchemist (itch) (Spark3Dvision)
description:
This game was made for the #stopwaitingforgodot game jam 2021.
https://itch.io/jam/stop-waiting-for-godot

Normaly I'm an artist, but today I wanted to join a game jam and make a whole game by myself. Crazy right? But man is it fun!

Gameplay loop: Customers request random potions, you need to assemble and give it to them. (endless mode)

Controls: Point & Click
